tool_name: Pan Card Verification at Lowest price
tool_description: Instant PAN Card Verification using government database check. This API verifies details of a PAN Card by confirming them from the Government database, ensuring a faster, safer, and smarter onboarding process.

api_list.name: Verify PAN Card
api_list.description: This API instantly verifies details of a PAN Card by confirming them from the Government database, allowing you to ensure that individuals or merchants hold a valid PAN card.

required_parameters.name: panNumber
required_parameters.description: The PAN number to be verified.
